title: José Leroy
text: José Leroy (born 4 August 1957) is a French <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201976%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20flyweight">men's light flyweight</a> event at the <a href="1976%20Summer%20Olympics">1976 Summer Olympics</a>.
